name: TOF Animalz
description:
True Or False - Animalz

A Watch-App Animal-Quiz with countless interesting and funny questions you can answer by tap on true or false. Learn some strange facts from the animal world.

Do you know everything on animals? Test your skills!
You have 30 seconds, or optional in the settings menu up to one minute, to solve as many fact-questions as you can.
There are up to 150 facts randomly presented so you have countless hours of fun and stunning.

An other fine «Z-App» from Skullz23.
